app.title: A good friend always pays his debts - Split an event expenses among its participants
app.description: Create an event with participants, add expenses and split it among selected participants. Get a recap of the amounts owed by each.

EXPENSE_ADDED_SUCCESS.title: Done!
EXPENSE_ADDED_SUCCESS.content: The expense has been added to the event successfully.

EXPENSE_DELETED_SUCCESS.title: Done!
EXPENSE_DELETED_SUCCESS.content: The expense has been deleted from the event successfully.

PARTICIPANT_ADDED_SUCCESS.title: Done!
PARTICIPANT_ADDED_SUCCESS.content: The participant has been added to the event successfully.

PARTICIPANT_UPDATED_SUCCESS.title: Done!
PARTICIPANT_UPDATED_SUCCESS.content: The participant has been updated successfully.

home.title: A good friend always pays his debts
home.pitch: Split an event expenses between its participants.

create.title: Create your event
create.email_help: Emails are only used to send reminders.

errors.EVENT_NAME_REQUIRED: You must specify a name for the event
errors.PARTICIPANTS_REQUIRED: You must specify at least one participant for the event
errors.PARTICIPANT_NAME_REQUIRED: You must specify a name for each participant
errors.PARTICIPANT_SHARE_REQUIRED: You must specify the share of each participant
errors.INVALID_SHARE: The share of each participant must be greater than 0
errors.DEFAULT: Sorry, an error occurred while creating the event

errors.EXPENSE_LABEL_REQUIRED: You must specify a label for the expense
errors.EXPENSE_AMOUNT_REQUIRED: You must specify the amount of the expense
errors.INVALID_AMOUNT: The specified amount must be greater than 0
errors.DEFAULT: Sorry, an error occurred while creating the expense

errors.PARTICIPANT_SHARE_REQUIRED: You must specify the share of the participant
errors.INVALID_SHARE: The share of the participant must be greater than 0

errors.INVALID_EMAIL: The email must be a valid
errors.DEFAULT: Sorry, an error occurred while updating the participant
